name: immerser
description: Javascript library for switching fixed elements on scroll through sections. Like Midnight.js, but without jQuery
author: dubaua <dubaua@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist && parcel build immerser.js -o immerser.min.js
scripts.docs: rimraf docs && parcel build --no-content-hash example/index.html -d docs/ --public-url ./
